tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Firstly, if you are in two minds about visiting the dentist given the covid issue, rest assured about this clinic - they have robust preventive safety measures in place to ensure that your visit is as safe as could ever be. Secondly, it is a misconception that a visit to the dentist is painful. Dr. Ekta has an friendly disposition which immediately puts you at ease while she patiently understands your problem and explains the treatment needed. The state of the art equipment and her professional expertise ensures that your treatment is complete and effective. I must add that this is the first doctor I've met who herself follows up with the patient to enquire about his recovery and condition after treatment and schedules followup visits till she's satisfied with the totality of the treatment. I would highly recommend Dr Ekta for any dental trouble.
reply_text:
Thank you very much Mr Nayak ! ðŸ™‚ it's our pleasure to provide you with quality dental care always ðŸ™‚
Regards

review:
Dr.Ekta is very professional and prompt with information, diagnosis and treatment. 

During these Covid times, she had a detailed process for booking of appointment and also followed all safety precautions while providing the treatment.

The clinic is well equipped and also very clean and neat.

review: Dr.Ekta is very fine doctor who knows her job very well she took utmost care and provided detail information about my dental issues and answered my queries satisfyingly on and In addition she is approachable and took follow up regularly after treatment I would highly recommend her to my friend and relatives Thanks a lot Dr.EktaðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am usually not a very doctor oriented person, especially Dentists. But Dr. Ekta, made me really comfy and explained my concerns in a way that the relevance of me taking care of them on a regular basis, would have saved me a lot of trouble.
I find Dr. Ekta Kukreja, a very warm and well-meaning doc, and while my treatment is still on... I am extremely confident that I am in good hands.
reply_text: Thank you dear Sushmita ! Our Pleasure proving you with quality dental care always ðŸ™‚

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This was my first treatment at the clinic. They take utmost care of sanitization and safety. Doctor explained everything very thoroughly and the entire procedure of filling was completely painless. This was the first place where I had no pain at all during entire process. Will recommend the doc for all dental problems.
reply_text:
Thank you very much Saurabh !
Our pleasure providing you with quality dental care always ðŸ™‚
